content: Sootthaaraa namaskaaram

Karunayulllla daivame ninte vaathilil nyangallude apekshayude svaram muttunnu. Ninne vandikkunnavarude aavashyangalle nee virodhikkaruthe. Daivame, nyangallude balaheenathayude sahaayatthinu ninne nyangall villikkunnu. Nallavane, nyangallude apekshayude svaram kettu ninte karunayaal nyangallude yaachanakall nalkumaaraakaname.
Maar apreminte bovusaa

Nyangallkkulllla kartthaave
Nyaaniha nidrayozhinyittu
Unarvvode nin thirumumpil
Nilppaanenikku nee nalkaname.

Veendum nyaanurangunnaakil
Enikkulllla enteyurakkam
Kartthaave nin thirumumpil
Dosham koodaathaakaname.

Ennunarchayil nyaan chathipedukil
Nin nanmayil nyaan porukkappedum
Urakkatthil nyaan pizhachengkil
Poruppaan karuna nee cheyyaname.

Thavaksheenatthil skeeppaayaal
Nallayurakkamenikku nee thaa
Aakaa svapnamashuddhiyil ni-
Nnenne nee rakshichu kollllaname.

Nirappuniranya urakkatthil
Raavokke enne nee bharikka
Thanyavarum vendaaninavum
Ennil mushkaramaakkalle.

Ninteyadiyaan nyaanathinaa
Lente sandhikall kaappaanaay
Vellivinude maalaakhaye
Enikku nee tharanam kartthaave.

Dveshathapettapekshayil ni
Nnenne nee rakshichukollllaname.
Uyirpetta nin dehatthe
Nyaananubhavichennathinaale.

Nyaan charinyanukoolatthaalurangumpoll
Ninte chorayenikku kaaval
Nin manachilinoode svathakarmmam
Nin krpayode nalkaname.

Nin kai mananya shareeratthil
Ninte valatthethaakaname.
Ninte karunakall kottayathaa
Yenikku nee chuttichu kollllaname.

Shareeramadangiyurangumpoll
Kaavalathaayathu nin shakthi.
Saurabhyamaaya dhoopam po
Lenteyurakkam thirumumpilâ€¦

Ninneppettennammayude
Ninnodullllayapekshayaale
Enikkulllla shayanatthinmel
Thinmappettavananayaruthe.

Enikku vendeettundaayennaa
Ninakkulllla poojayaale
Enne vyasanatthilaakkaay/u200bvaan
Saatthaane nee mudakkaname.

Kartthaave nin paranyoppu
Ente pakkal thikaykkename.
Ninakkulllla sleebaa(+)yaale
Ente aayussu kaakkaname.

Nyaanunarappettannappoll
Ninne nyaan kondaaduvaan
Ente thallarchayude pakkal
Ninteyupavi nee kaattaname.

Nin thirumanassine nyaanarinyu
Nyaanathine chey/u200bvaanaay
Nin thirumanogunamathinaale
Enikku nee manogunam cheyyaname.

Nirappu niranyorantiyum
Punyathvatthinude raavum
Nyangallude rakshaakaran mishihaa
Kartthaave adiyaarkku nee tharika
.
Vellivil thaan prakaashichu
Vellivil thanne paarkkunnu.
Vellivinude sutharaayavarum
Ninnetthanne vandikkunnu.

Ninakku sthuthi ninnanugrahangall
Nyangallude melumathaakaname
Ihalokatthilumathupole
Paralokatthilumathaakaname.

Ente kartthaave! Ninakku sthuthi!
Ninakku sthuthi sthuthi! Ninakku sthuthi!
Aayirangallude aayiravum
Allavukoodaathe ninakkusthi.

Namaskkaaram kellkkunnavane!
Yaachanakall nalkunnavane!
Nyangallude namaskkaaram kettu
Yaachanakall nalkeedaname.
Apeksha
/Tmahonnathante maravilirikkunnavanaaya kartthaave! Ninte anugrahatthinte chirakukallude nizhalin keezhil nyangalle marachu nyangalludemel anugraham cheyyaname.
/tsakalavum kellkkunnavane! Ninte anugrahatthaal ninte adiyaarude apeksha kellkkaname.
/tmahatthvamulllla raajaavum nyangallude rakshakanumaaya mashihaa! Nirappu niranyirikkunna sandhyayum punyamulllla raavum nyangallkku tharaname.
/tnyangallude kannukall ningkalekku nokkikkondirikkunnu. Nyangallude kadangallum paapangallum pariharichu ihaparamaaya randu lokangallilum nyangallodu karuna cheyyaname.
/tkartthaave! Ninte anugrahangall nyangalle marachu ninte krpa nyangallude mukhangallil nilkkaname; ninte sleebaa dushdanil ninnum avante sainyangallil ninnum nyangalle kaatthukollllaname.

/tnyangall jeevanodirikkunna naallukall okkeyum ninte valathukai nyangalludemel aavasippikkaname. Ninte nirappu nyangallude idayil vaazhumaaraakaname. Ninnodapekshikkunna aathmaakkallkku sharanavum rakshayum undaakkaname.
/tninne prasavicha mariyaaminteyum, ninte sakala parishuddhanmaarudeyum praarththhanayaal, daivame! Nyangallude kadangallkku parihaaramundaakki, nyangallude mel anugraham cheyyaname.
(kaumaa)
Svargasthhanaaya nyangallude pithaave!...
Krpa niranya mariyame!...
Apeksha

Shuddhamulllla baavaa shuddhamulllla ninte thirunaamatthaal nyangalle nee kaatthukollllaname. Rakshithaavaaya puthraa! Jayamulllla ninte sleebaa(1) yaal nyangalle nee marachukollllaname. Shuddhamulllla roohaa shuddhamulllla ninte kudiyirippinte bhavanangallaayi nyangalle nee chamaykkename. Nyangalloode daivamaaya kartthaave neramokkeyilum ellaa samayavum ninte daivathvatthinte chirakukallude keezhil ennekkum nyangalle  nee marachu kollllaname. Aammeen.
(sootthaaraa namaskkaaram thikanyu)
